characters.name: Cow
characters.description: A large, round-bodied animal with black and white patches, a pair of horns on its head, and a long tail. It has four sturdy legs and distinctively large eyes. Its body is a blend of globular shapes with smooth edges.

characters.name: Moon
characters.description: A large, white, crescent-shaped object with surface craters that create a textured, polka-dotted appearance. It appears suspended in a night sky.

scenes.background_description: A serene night sky with countless twinkling stars scattered across the vast expanse. In the center, a large, radiant full moon glows softly, casting a gentle, luminescent light. The scene is enchanted, showcasing an ethereal landscape below with a flat silhouette of rolling hills and a quiet meadow. In this dreamlike setting, a whimsical cow is captured mid-flight, gracefully leaping over the moon, with its form silhouetted against the bright lunar backdrop.
scenes.narration_text: The Cow Flies Over the Moon
